destination: Leave Earth Far Behind: A Mission to Mars
description: Our most popular cruise - Spend 14 days off the only world you have ever known. The full mission includes a 6 day journey to our port, 2 full (Earth) days on planet, and a 6 day journey back.

destination: One Small Step into Space: A Moon Adventure
description: You've spent every night gazing up at our favorite rock that orbits our planet - why not finally set foot on it? The full mission includes a 3 day journey to our port, a full (Earth) day on planet, and a 3 day journey back.
